Create a mobile app that suggests recipes based on the user's daily routine and dietary preferences, using machine learning algorithms to predict what they'll like most.
Develop a smart juicer that can automatically adjust its settings based on the type of fruit or vegetable being used, ensuring optimal extraction and maximum flavor.
Launch a subscription service for fresh, locally sourced produce delivered straight to the user's doorstep, complete with recipe suggestions and cooking tips.
Design a line of eco-friendly juicing accessories made from recycled materials, encouraging users to reduce their environmental impact while enjoying their healthy beverages.
Host a series of interactive workshops and classes focused on the benefits of juicing and how to create delicious, nutrient-dense drinks at home, using live demonstrations and hands-on activities.
